desc: Rose Gold, diamond coated, 6-blade shaving system that works even better than it looks! Female focused shaving and body products for women who crave high quality products to make grooming more convenient, beautiful and fun! Serving women across the US & Canada.

layout.text: Looking for the smoothest, closest shave that's gentle on even the most sensitive skin? You're in the right place. Our Rose Gold, 6-blade  diamond coated shaving system will leave you smooth as a petal and irritation free. Shaving plans customized based on your shaving habits.
